      • build

        public void build()
           throws java.io.UnsupportedEncodingException,
                  java.net.URISyntaxException

        Builds the HttpClient

        Only call this if the Header or the Credentials have changed

        Note: this Method already calls addParametersToRequest()

        Throws:
        java.io.UnsupportedEncodingException
        java.net.URISyntaxException

                            throws java.net.URISyntaxException,

        Only call this if the Parameters have changed

        public void execute()
             throws java.io.IOException

        Executes the built HttpRequestBase

        To get the Response call getResponse()

        Throws:
        java.io.IOException

      • getResponse

        public java.io.InputStream getResponse()
